basics.name: Josh Davis
basics.label: Director of Platform Engineering
basics.summary: Experienced IT leader passionate about driving developer productivity, optimizing cloud infrastructure, and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

work.summary: Led a team of 40+ engineers across DevEx, DevOps, DBRE, and Identity functions. Achieved a 20% improvement in developer productivity in 2024.
highlights: Migrated to GitOps for improved collaboration and deployment efficiency.
Implemented a service mesh to enhance microservices communication and observability.
Created an internal developer portal to streamline access to tools and resources.
Optimized cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure, reducing costs by 15%.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines and observability solutions.
